name: Strv 74A2 Mega Pack
detailed_description:
Use the rare Premium tank Strv 74A2 and a pile of bonuses to show the enemy who owns the battlefield now!



Strv 74A2

The main feature of this Tier VI Premium tank is its three-shell magazine-fed gun that will fill your battles with adrenaline. In only four seconds, you'll send three accurate shots and deal a lot of damage to your rival. Change the position, wait 14 seconds for the magazine to reload, and you can make three new holes in your enemy!

10 Certificates for the Graphite Rare camouflage

This warpaint, which is only available to Steam users, will increase concealment of your vehicles and make them look stylish. Win gracefully!

30 Days of Premium Account

  • Earn 50% more experience and credits for each battle. The more XP and credits you have, the closer you are to cool vehicles with top modules!
  • Battle wearing the Undeniable Advantage special camouflage that is only available to owners of Premium Account.
  • Park your vehicles in the stunning, animated Garage with a cozy kitchen.

1,000,000 credits

It's enough to maintain the necessary equipment for your Strv 74A2, buy a Tier VI vehicle, or go to many battles without worrying about recurring expenses.

100 of each XP type and Rare Credit boosters

  • 100 Combat XP boosters to upgrade faster.
  • 100 Free XP boosters to research vehicles without even playing in them.
  • 100 Crew XP boosters to make the vehicle more effective and skilled.
  • 100 Credit boosters to make the battles even more profitable!

CVC Helmet Avatar

A tanker's helmet with the World of Tanks Blitz logo will be displayed next to your nickname in battle and in the Garage. This avatar can only be received along with some Steam add-ins. Wear it with pride!

short_description: Break into World of Tanks Blitz with the tornadic Strv 74A2 and a pile of bonuses! Use its three-shell magazine-fed gun to show who owns the battlefield now!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Czech*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.0, 8.1, 10 
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compliant video card with 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mac OS X 10.9 supported models: https://support.apple.com/kb/SP702

subs.option_text: World of Tanks Blitz - Strv 74A2 Mega Pack - 8,19€
